project.name: C-C412A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C412A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive During preprocessing, files are created and placed in a directory to represent a lock that is externally accessible and unrestricted The program itself reads an input string. It will attempt to create a lock by creating a file in the testData directory named <input string>.lck. If such a file does not exist, it will run to completion. If such a file does exists, it will wait until it is deleted so that it can create its own file. This results in a deadlock. testData directory. Bad inputs: name of a file that does exist under the testData directory.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="critical" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C412A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: During preprocessing, files are created and placed in a directory to represent a lock that is externally accessible and unrestricted The program itself reads an input string. It will attempt to create a lock by creating a file in the testData directory named <input string>.lck. If such a file does not exist, it will run to completion. If such a file does exists, it will wait until it is deleted so that it can create its own file. This results in a deadlock. testData directory. Bad inputs: name of a file that does exist under the testData directory.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="file1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_OXXIhNaposWRUUqniL2Z AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_dgUOZYRDmB OR (NOT finished_migZSawecN AND NOT (controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1 OR continued_execution_JWTrqPf25Y)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_dgUOZYRDmB OR (NOT finished_migZSawecN AND NOT (controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1 OR continued_execution_JWTrqPf25Y))) OR controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_dgUOZYRDmB OR (NOT finished_migZSawecN AND NOT (controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1 OR continued_execution_JWTrqPf25Y)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_dgUOZYRDmB OR (NOT finished_migZSawecN AND NOT (controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1 OR continued_execution_JWTrqPf25Y))) OR controlled_exit_CpypnOAay1))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Made it to the critical section" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
